p.d: After crossing the Somme Bay aboard a train bearing the same name, we then catch a magnificent Corpel-Louvet dating from 1906. We explore Normandy's seaside resorts thanks to the regional train that serves the Côte Fleurie. Then, in the Aine, another gem awaits us, the Petit Train du Vermandois... Directed by: Jean-Luc Lénée (France, 2019)
